item.title: The P85 Standard
item.description: What actuaries have known for a century that software organisations are only now beginning to discover â€” and why anything below P85 is an unhedged gamble.

item.title: What Is Probabilistic Delivery?
item.description: Why dashboards lie, story points fail, and actuarial science is the only honest alternative to the comfortable fiction of sprint velocity.
